SantaSpecialText.Graveyard1: Ho ho ho! Wait, look at this place... did I come two months too early!?
SantaSpecialText.Graveyard2: Naughty or Nice? Hm, how unusual... the people here have all been crossed off my list for some time now.
SantaSpecialText.Party: Come now, you didn't think I only celebrated on Christmas did you?
SantaSpecialText.Rain1: Got a torch? If so, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?!
SantaSpecialText.Storm1: Oh ho... whoah! There goes Dasher. There went Donner, too!
SantaSpecialText.Windy1: Ho ho! My reindeer will fly at mach speeds, tonight!

TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.DislikeCrowded: I prefer to work alone, in the presence of just my elves. I dislike all the distractions!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.FarFromHome: Hello there! I'm far from my temporary home!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateBiome: I'm adding you to the naughty list for putting me in a awful place like {BiomeName}.
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateCrowded: This is a pretty big crowd, each and every one on the naughty list. I hate carrying that heavy bag of coal!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.HateNPC: I hate people who don't believe in me! For example, {NPCName}, the naughtiest I've ever known!
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LikeNPC_Princess: Ho ho ho, {NPCName} is most certainly on top of the nice list.
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LoveBiome: I absolutely love it here! Are you surprised? Who thought I wouldn't like {BiomeName}?
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.LoveSpace: Ho ho ho! Just me and my elves, a perfect place for my remote workshop.
TownNPCMood_SantaClaus.NoHome: I can't just go back to the north pole when I please, ho ho ho! Think you can spot me a temporary house?
